description: This file defines message output classes and functions within the WPEFramework Publishers namespace, including various output methods like console, syslog, file, JSON conversion, and UDP transmission. It handles message formatting, conversion, and delivery via different channels, with some classes implementing specific message handling and formatting logic.

classes.name: Text
classes.description: Provides conversion of message metadata and text into a formatted string.

classes.name: ConsoleOutput
classes.description: Handles outputting messages to the console via standard output.

classes.name: SyslogOutput
classes.description: Handles outputting messages to syslog or console on Windows.

classes.name: FileOutput
classes.description: Writes messages to a file if the file is open.

classes.name: JSON
classes.description: Converts message information and text into a JSON data structure with selectable options.

classes.name: UDPOutput
classes.description: Handles UDP transmission of messages through an internal Channel class.

classes.name: UDPOutput::Channel
classes.description: A datagram channel used to send message data over a network.

methods.name: Text::Convert
methods.description: Converts message info and text into a string representation.

methods.name: ConsoleOutput::Message
methods.description: Outputs formatted message to standard output.

methods.name: SyslogOutput::Message
methods.description: Outputs formatted message to syslog or console.

methods.name: FileOutput::Message
methods.description: Writes formatted message to an open file.

methods.name: JSON::Convert
methods.description: Populates a data structure with message info and text based on output options, formatting timestamps, categories, and other metadata.

methods.name: UDPOutput::Channel::Channel
methods.description: Constructor that initializes a datagram socket for a given NodeId.

methods.name: UDPOutput::Channel::SendData
methods.description: Sends data over the socket, copying from internal buffer.

methods.name: UDPOutput::Channel::StateChange
methods.description: Empty method placeholder for state changes.

methods.name: UDPOutput::Channel::Output
methods.description: Serializes message metadata and message into internal buffer and triggers sending.

methods.name: UDPOutput::UDPOutput
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the UDP output channel.

methods.name: UDPOutput::Message
methods.description: Recreates a TextMessage and sends it over the UDP output channel.

methods.name: string Convert(const Core::Messaging::MessageInfo & metadata,const string & text)
void Convert(const Core::Messaging::MessageInfo & metadata,const string & text,Data & data)
void Message(const Core::Messaging::MessageInfo & metadata,const string & text)
void Output(const Core::Messaging::Metadata & metadata,const Core::Messaging::IEvent * message)
